description: presentation cup, two-handled, George I, engraved with contemporary coat-of-arms
inscription:
Inscription

On the side of the arms of Doneraile (St. Leger) with Deane in pretence, probably for Hays, fourth viscount Doneraile, who in 1722 married Elizabeth, eldest daughter and co-heir of Lord Chief Baren Deane.
markings:
Marks

Date letter and harp crowned on underside of base.
title: Presentation cup
